languages.text: На вашем пути повстречаются контейнеры, ящики и прочие объекты окружения, которые можно обыскивать. Внутри хранятся самые разные трофеи — от вещей, которые никогда не пригодятся Вольному Торговцу (но будут полезны торговцам), до новой экипировки и сюжетно важных предметов. Подойдите к объекту и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}. Если объектов несколько, выберите желаемый с помощью {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}. В дальнейшем вам повстречаются запертые контейнеры — чтобы их открыть, членам отряда будет необходимо успешно пройти {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} требуемого {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыка{/g}.

traits.locale_text: На вашем пути повстречаются контейнеры, ящики и прочие объекты окружения, которые можно обыскивать. Внутри хранятся самые разные трофеи — от вещей, которые никогда не пригодятся Вольному Торговцу (но будут полезны торговцам), до новой экипировки и сюжетно важных предметов. Подойдите к объекту и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}. Если объектов несколько, выберите желаемый с помощью {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}. В дальнейшем вам повстречаются запертые контейнеры — чтобы их открыть, членам отряда будет необходимо успешно пройти проверку требуемого {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыка{/g}.

languages.text:
In your travels, you will come across containers, crates, and other objects in the environment that you can search. Inside, you can find a variety of loot — from things that are of no use to a Rogue Trader (but may still pique a merchant's interest) to new equipment and important plot items.
Approach the object and press {console_bind|Confirm}. If there are multiple objects nearby, select the one you need using {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
You will also encounter locked containers. To open such a container, your party members will have to pass the associated {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.
languages.original_text: На вашем пути повстречаются контейнеры, ящики и прочие объекты окружения, которые можно обыскивать. Внутри хранятся самые разные трофеи — от вещей, которые никогда не пригодятся Вольному Торговцу (но будут полезны торговцам), до новой экипировки и сюжетно важных предметов. Подойдите к объекту и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}. Если объектов несколько, выберите желаемый с помощью {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}. В дальнейшем вам повстречаются запертые контейнеры — чтобы их открыть, членам отряда будет необходимо успешно пройти {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} требуемого {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыка{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
You will come across containers, crates, and other objects in the environment that you can search. Inside, you can find a variety of loot — from things that are of no use to a Rogue Trader but can still pique a merchant's interest to new equipment and important plot items.
Approach the object and press {console_bind|Confirm}. If there are multiple objects nearby, select the one you need using {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
You will also encounter locked containers. To open such a container, your party members will have to pass the associated {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} test.

In your travels, you will come across containers, crates, and other objects in the environment that you can search. Inside, you can find a variety of loot — from things that are of no use to a Rogue Trader (but may still pique a merchant's interest) to new equipment and important plot items.
Approach the object and press {console_bind|Confirm}. If there are multiple objects nearby, select the one you need using {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
You will also encounter locked containers. To open such a container, your party members will have to pass the associated {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} test.

In your travels, you will come across containers, crates, and other objects in the environment that you can search. Inside, you can find a variety of loot — from things that are of no use to a Rogue Trader (but may still pique a merchant's interest) to new equipment and important plot items.
Approach the object and press {console_bind|Confirm}. If there are multiple objects nearby, select the one you need using {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
You will also encounter locked containers. To open such a container, your party members will have to pass the associated {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

In your travels, you will come across containers, crates, and other objects in the environment that you can search. Inside, you can find a variety of loot — from things that are of no use to a Rogue Trader (but may still pique a merchant's interest) to new equipment and important plot items.
Approach the object and press {console_bind|Confirm}. If there are multiple objects nearby, select the one you need using {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
You will also encounter locked containers. To open such a container, your party members will have to pass the associated {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

languages.text:
En tus aventuras habrá contenedores, cajas y otros objetos que puedes encontrar por el entorno. Dentro de ellos puede haber botín de lo más diverso: desde artículos que de poco sirven a un Comerciante Independiente (pero que pueden hacer las delicias de cualquier mercader) hasta equipamiento nuevo y objetos importantes para la trama.
Acércate al objeto y pulsa {console_bind|Confirm}. Si tienes varios objetos cerca, elige el que necesites con {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
También encontrarás contenedores cerrados. Para abrirlos, los miembros de tu grupo tendrán que superar la {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} correspondiente.
languages.original_text:
In your travels, you will come across containers, crates, and other objects in the environment that you can search. Inside, you can find a variety of loot — from things that are of no use to a Rogue Trader (but may still pique a merchant's interest) to new equipment and important plot items.
Approach the object and press {console_bind|Confirm}. If there are multiple objects nearby, select the one you need using {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
You will also encounter locked containers. To open such a container, your party members will have to pass the associated {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
En tus aventuras habrá contenedores, cajas y otros objetos que puedes encontrar por el entorno. Dentro de ellos puede haber botín de lo más diverso: desde artículos que de poco sirven a un Comerciante Independiente (pero que pueden hacer las delicias de cualquier mercader) hasta equipamiento nuevo y objetos importantes para la trama.
Acércate al objeto y pulsa {console_bind|Confirm}. Si tienes varios objetos cerca, elige el que necesites con {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
También encontrarás contenedores cerrados. Para abrirlos, los miembros de tu grupo tendrán que superar la {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} correspondiente.

languages.text:
旅中に、探索可能な環境内でコンテナ、木箱、その他のオブジェクトを見つけることができる。中には、自由開拓者には何の役にも立たないもの（それでも商人の興味をそそるかもしれない）から、新しい装備品や重要なプロットアイテムまで、さまざまな戦利品がある。
先ずはオブジェクトに近づき、{console_bind|Confirm}を押す。近くに複数のオブジェクトがある場合は、{console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp} を使って必要なオブジェクトを選択する。
中には、鍵のかかったコンテナにも遭遇することもある。このようなコンテナを開けるには、グループメンバーが関連する{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}テスト{/g}に合格する必要がある。
languages.original_text:
In your travels, you will come across containers, crates, and other objects in the environment that you can search. Inside, you can find a variety of loot — from things that are of no use to a Rogue Trader (but may still pique a merchant's interest) to new equipment and important plot items.
Approach the object and press {console_bind|Confirm}. If there are multiple objects nearby, select the one you need using {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
You will also encounter locked containers. To open such a container, your party members will have to pass the associated {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
旅中に、探索可能な環境内でコンテナ、木箱、その他のオブジェクトを見つけることができる。中には、自由開拓者には何の役にも立たないもの（それでも商人の興味をそそるかもしれない）から、新しい装備品や重要なプロットアイテムまで、さまざまな戦利品がある。
オブジェクトに近づき、{console_bind|Confirm}を押す。近くに複数のオブジェクトがある場合は、{console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp} を使って必要なオブジェクトを選択する。
鍵のかかったコンテナにも遭遇することもある。このようなコンテナを開けるには、グループメンバーが関連する{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}テスト{/g}に合格する必要がある。

languages.text:
在旅途的过程中，您会遇到集装箱、板条箱或环境中的其他物件，您可以对其进行搜索。您可以在这些箱子里面找到各种各样的战利品，可能会找到对行商浪人毫无用处的垃圾（但可能会引起其他商贩的兴趣），以及新的装备，或是重要的剧情物品。
靠近物件，按下{console_bind|Confirm}。如果附近有多个物件，请使用{console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}切换您需要的物件。
您还会遇到上锁的箱子。若想打开上锁的箱子，您的队伍成员必须通过相关{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。
languages.original_text:
In your travels, you will come across containers, crates, and other objects in the environment that you can search. Inside, you can find a variety of loot — from things that are of no use to a Rogue Trader (but may still pique a merchant's interest) to new equipment and important plot items.
Approach the object and press {console_bind|Confirm}. If there are multiple objects nearby, select the one you need using {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
You will also encounter locked containers. To open such a container, your party members will have to pass the associated {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
在旅途的过程中，您会遇到集装箱、板条箱或环境中的其他物件，您可以对其进行搜索。您可以在这些箱子里面找到各种各样的战利品，可能会找到对行商浪人毫无用处的垃圾（但可能会引起其他商贩的兴趣），以及新的装备，或是重要的剧情物品。
靠近物件，按下{console_bind|Confirm}。如果附近有多个物件，请使用{console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}切换您需要的物件。
您还会遇到上锁的箱子。若想打开上锁的箱子，您的队伍成员必须通过相关{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。

languages.text:
Auf deinen Reisen wirst du auf Container, Kisten und andere Objekte in der Umgebung stoßen, die du durchsuchen kannst. Darin kannst du eine Unmenge an Beute finden – von Dingen, die für einen Freihändler nutzlos sind, (aber vielleicht das Interesse eines Händlers wecken), bis hin zu neuer Ausrüstung und wichtigen Story-Gegenständen.
Nähere dich dem Objekt und drücke {console_bind|Confirm}. Wenn mehrere Objekte in der Nähe sind, wähle das gewünschte Objekt mit {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp} aus.
Du wirst auch auf verschlossene Container stoßen. Um einen solchen Container zu öffnen, müssen die Mitglieder deiner Gruppe die entsprechende {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} bestehen.
languages.original_text:
In your travels, you will come across containers, crates, and other objects in the environment that you can search. Inside, you can find a variety of loot — from things that are of no use to a Rogue Trader (but may still pique a merchant's interest) to new equipment and important plot items.
Approach the object and press {console_bind|Confirm}. If there are multiple objects nearby, select the one you need using {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
You will also encounter locked containers. To open such a container, your party members will have to pass the associated {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Auf deinen Reisen wirst du auf Container, Kisten und andere Objekte in der Umgebung stoßen, die du durchsuchen kannst. Darin kannst du eine Unmenge an Beute finden – von Dingen, die für einen Freihändler nutzlos sind, (aber vielleicht das Interesse eines Händlers wecken), bis hin zu neuer Ausrüstung und wichtigen Story-Gegenständen.
Nähere dich dem Objekt und drücke {console_bind|Confirm}. Wenn mehrere Objekte in der Nähe sind, wähle das gewünschte mit {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp} aus.
Du wirst auch auf verschlossene Container stoßen. Um einen solchen Container zu öffnen, müssen die Mitglieder deiner Gruppe die entsprechende {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fähigkeits-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} schaffen.

languages.text:
Au cours de vos déplacements, vous trouverez des conteneurs, des caisses et d'autres objets que vous pourrez fouiller. Ils renferment un butin varié, des choses qui ne sont d'aucune utilité pour un libre-marchand (mais qui sont susceptibles de susciter l'intérêt d'un autre marchand), ainsi que de nouveaux équipements et des objets importants pour l'intrigue.
Approchez-vous de l'objet et appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm}. En présence de plusieurs objets, sélectionnez celui dont vous avez besoin à l'aide de {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
Vous trouverez également des conteneurs verrouillés. Pour les ouvrir, les membres de votre groupe devront réussir le {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g} correspondant.
languages.original_text:
In your travels, you will come across containers, crates, and other objects in the environment that you can search. Inside, you can find a variety of loot — from things that are of no use to a Rogue Trader (but may still pique a merchant's interest) to new equipment and important plot items.
Approach the object and press {console_bind|Confirm}. If there are multiple objects nearby, select the one you need using {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
You will also encounter locked containers. To open such a container, your party members will have to pass the associated {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Au cours de vos déplacements, vous rencontrerez des conteneurs, des caisses et d'autres objets que vous pourrez fouiller. Ils renferment un butin varié, des choses qui ne sont d'aucune utilité pour un Libre-Marchand (mais susceptibles de susciter l’intérêt d’un autre marchand), mais aussi de nouveaux équipements et des objets importants pour l’intrigue.
Approchez-vous de l'objet et appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm}. En présence de plusieurs objets, sélectionnez celui dont vous avez besoin à l’aide de {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
Vous rencontrerez également des conteneurs verrouillés. Pour les ouvrir, les membres de votre groupe devront réussir le {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g} correspondant.

languages.text:
Maceraların sırasında çevrede saklama yerleri, kasalar gibi içlerini araştırabileceğin nesnelere denk geleceksin. İçlerinden, bir Hür Tacir'in hiç işine yaramayacak (ama bir tüccarın ilgisini cezbedebilecek) şeylerden yeni ekipmana ve önemli senaryo eşyalarına kadar çeşitli ganimetler çıkabilir.
Nesneye yaklaş ve {console_bind|Confirm} düğmesine bas. Yakında birden fazla nesne varsa {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp} düğmelerini kullanarak istediğini seç.
Ayrıca kilitli saklama yerleriyle de karşılaşacaksın. Böyle bir saklama yerini açabilmen için, grup üyelerinin ilişkili {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}yetenek{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testini{/g} geçmeleri gerekir.
languages.original_text:
In your travels, you will come across containers, crates, and other objects in the environment that you can search. Inside, you can find a variety of loot — from things that are of no use to a Rogue Trader (but may still pique a merchant's interest) to new equipment and important plot items.
Approach the object and press {console_bind|Confirm}. If there are multiple objects nearby, select the one you need using {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
You will also encounter locked containers. To open such a container, your party members will have to pass the associated {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.
